<template>
  <el-col id="app" ref="app">
    <SelectionChat />
  </el-col>
</template>

<script>
import SelectionChat from './views/SelectionChat.vue'

export default {
  name: 'App',
  components: {
    SelectionChat
  },
  mounted() {
    this.$refs.app.scrollIntoView({behavior: 'smooth'})
  }
}
</script>

<style>
html, body {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
}

body {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  margin: 0;
}

#app {
  border: solid 1px;
  width: 50%;
  height: 50%;
  overflow-y: scroll;
  overflow-x: hidden
}
</style>
